title: PFAS)
description: Codification of 9 PFAS added to TRI for RY2025 (due July 1, 2026): Includes production volumes, exposures, and hazards for TRI-covered facilities. De minimis exemption eliminated; CBI review for identities.

title: Tenders
description: Tender for Due Diligence Statements (DDS) under EUDR: Plot-level geolocation submission for commodities (cocoa/soy) by 30/12/2025 for large companies; risk benchmarking via TRACES.

title: RFQ
description: RFQ for BuyAmerica waiver: Sourcing with 65% domestic content for infrastructure; small business set-asides via eBuy, 5-30 day duration with SOW and past performance criteria.

title: Reporting
description: Reporting of packaging data for EPR: Submission of material weights, polymer types, and end-of-life fate by 15/11/2025 for 2023 data; fees starting 2027.

title: (Chile)
description: Investment for green H2 production: US$1B fund for electrolysis (solar/wind), targeting $0.70-$1.60/kg by 2050; pilot corridors in Chile/Argentina for 2025-2030 rollout.

title: Sustainability
description: Assistance for new sustainability criteria for agriculture/forest biomass under RED III: Policy analysis, stakeholder consultations and reporting for EU 2025 targets (42% renewables).

title: Guarantees
description: Lead advisor for EGRE facility: Transaction support for €1B+ guarantees for renewable projects (solar/wind) in EU/LAC, including risk assessment and financial structuring for 2025-2030.

title: Delay
description: Delay in PFAS reporting under TSCA: Reporting period begins 11/07/2025 (ends 11/01/2026 for small manufacturers); includes data collection for 2011-2022.

title: (Argentina/Brazil)
description: Scaling H2 for jobs/emissions reduction: RFQ for low-carbon projects in Argentina/Brazil, including $300B investment pipeline for 200+ sites by 2050.

title: Products)
description: RFQ for BuyAmerica waivers: 65% domestic content for infra; set-asides via eBuy, SOW and past performance.

title: PFAS)
description: Addition of 9 PFAS to TRI for RY2025: Reporting of releases/waste management; de minimis exemption removed for PFAS.

title: RFQs
description: Active RFQs for BuyAmerica infrastructure: Quotes via eBuy for waivers and domestic sourcing, with RFQ duration of days/weeks and SOW for services.

title: TED
description: Tender for EUDR Information System: RFQ for submissão de DDS via TRACES, with virtual training 27/11/2025. Foco em lifecycle de due diligence statements.

title: RFQ
description: RFQ for EPR fee modulation: Reports for packaging with >30% recycled content; bids via Ariba for PRO schemes.

title: Guide
description: Electronics PFAS guide: Supplier scrutiny for intentionally added PFAS in components; reporting for 2025 bans.

title: Tenders
description: Global e-waste tenders: RFQ for disposal/recycling of electronics, job creation in recycling for 2025.

title: American
description: DFARS Buy American: 60% domestic content for defense; qualifying countries and COTS exceptions for 2025.

title: Launch
description: EUDR Information System launch: DDS submission for operators/traders, audit-ready for 30/12/2025 deadline.

title: UK
description: Plastic packaging tax for 2025: 30% recycled content requirement, modulation for EPR compliance.

title: Deforestation-Free
description: Timber RFQ for deforestation-free supply: IWAY portal compliance with EUDR, waivers for domestic US/LAC.
